item.title: Letter will be sent to India seeking Hasina's extradition: Asif Nazrul
item.description: Legal, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs Adviser Prof Dr Asif Nazrul has said that a letter will be sent to India seeking the extradition of Sheikh Hasina.
